game.name: Space Attack
game.description:
Your twelve constellations have been invaded by the enemy fighter planes. Now you have taken a responsibility to fight against your enemies and bring them back. Are you ready to go on the memorable adventure of your life? Join Space Attack game and be prepared to prove the world that you are skilled enough to operate spacecraft. It is pretty simple to operate it with the help of your mouse on PC or tapping the screen on mobile phone. 
Buy the shield first through the diamonds you have given from the attribute shop when you enter this brand new adventure game. The entire space is full of dangerous aliensâ€™ planes or spaceships. Try to be careful to fight against the aliens star wars spaceships. Aliens keep marching towards the earth planet. The only way to overcome them is to shoot their endless waves and clean the space from the deadly souls. You can move your tank forth and back and do not forget to shoot the flying saucer for additional points in this best space shooting and survival game. 
Build the space ships by destroying the enemy base. It is important to follow a strategy to complete the game with the highest possible score. Play this puzzle to grab money in this cool html5 strategy game. You have the ability here to hide your four shields, but remember your enemies or their missiles can destroy them eventually. Grab as many diamonds as you can to upgrade your weapons and improve your power for further fights in this one of the best shooter games.
